statements: SELECT * FROM wallet_balances;
SELECT user_id, wallet_balance FROM wallet_balances;
SELECT wallet_balance, user_id FROM wallet_balances;
SELECT * FROM wallet_balances WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT user_id, wallet_balance FROM wallet_balances WHERE wallet_balance > 100.00;
SELECT user_id, wallet_balance FROM wallet_balances WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT wallet_balance, user_id FROM wallet_balances WHERE wallet_balance > 1000 ORDER BY wallet_balance DESC
SELECT * FROM wallet_balances WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT user_id, wallet_balance FROM wallet_balances ORDER BY user_id ASC, wallet_balance DESC
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users, SUM(wallet_balance) AS total_balance FROM wallet_balances
SELECT * FROM WalletBalances;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM WalletBalances WHERE balance > 100;
SELECT user_id, balance, last_updated FROM WalletBalances ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, transaction_type FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit';
SELECT user_id, balance FROM WalletBalances WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM WalletBalances WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM WalletBalances ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM Transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM WalletBalances JOIN Transactions ON WalletBalances.user_id = Transactions.user_id;

SELECT user_id, transaction_type, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY user_id, transaction_type ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM wallet_accounts;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM wallet_accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT account_id, account_name, balance FROM wallet_accounts WHERE account_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT account_id, previous_balance, updated_balance FROM account_history WHERE previous_balance <> updated_balance ORDER BY account_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM wallet_accounts WHERE account_id = 1;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM wallet_accounts WHERE balance > 5000;
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'WITHDRAWAL';
SELECT account_id, transaction_id, previous_balance, updated_balance FROM account_history ORDER BY history_id DESC;

SELECT account_name, balance, transaction_type, amount FROM wallet_accounts JOIN transactions ON wallet_accounts.account_id = transactions.account_id WHERE balance < 1000 AND transaction_type = 'WITHDRAWAL';
SELECT id, user_id, balance FROM wallet_accounts;
SELECT * FROM wallet_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, amount FROM wallet_transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT log_message, log_date FROM wallet_logs WHERE log_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT account_id, updated_balance, update_date FROM wallet_updates ORDER BY update_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM wallet_accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT user_id, SUM(balance) as total_balance FROM wallet_accounts GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_balance > 5000
SELECT user_id, balance FROM wallet_accounts INNER JOIN wallet_transactions ON wallet_accounts.id = wallet_transactions.account_id
SELECT * FROM wallet_transactions WHERE amount < 0 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT account_id, MAX(updated_balance) as max_balance FROM wallet_updates GROUP BY account_id HAVING max_balance > 500
SELECT * FROM WalletAccount;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM WalletAccount ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM UserDetail WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_type FROM WalletTransaction WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, currency, language FROM AccountSettings;
SELECT * FROM WalletAccount ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM WalletAccount WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM UserDetail WHERE user_id = 'c579fb90-13ab-4aa5-aa65-7ad63b7b0788';
SELECT t.user_id, t.amount, h.balance FROM WalletTransaction t JOIN WalletHistory h ON t.transaction_id = h.transaction_id WHERE t.amount > 5000;
SELECT u.full_name, a.currency FROM UserDetail u JOIN AccountSettings a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE a.currency = 'USD';
